subject: Question about shipping
description_text:
Hello, good morning. I'm writing because I'm interested in buying The
Simpsons Plus X, but I wanted to know if there's any way, even if it means
paying more for shipping, to have it sent via DHL. I'm from Argentina, and
shipments with other couriers always have problems with taxes, so to make
the purchase I need some way to know that the order will be sent by DHL.

conversations.body_text: Hi Franco Viarengo,  I apologize for the delayed response.  You may select express shipping, and we will ship your order via DHL.
